means: 保证，约定（plight的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: They plighted their troth for the rest of their days.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们俩盟誓结为终身伴侣.

sentence.Network_en: Here and there a raw young lady does think of the friends of her plighted man.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是阅历不深的的年轻姑娘对她未婚夫的朋友往往会持有的看法.

sentence.Network_en: Her parents plighted her to the son of a Lord.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的父母把她许配给了一个贵族家庭的公子.
